snippet: Federal Communications Commission Chairman Tom Wheeler is broadening the scope of his proposed open Internet rules and suggesting tougher standards for Internet providers who wish to create paid priority fast lanes on their networks....

headline.print_headline: FCC Revising Internet Rules After Public Backlash
headline.main: FCC Revising Internet Rules After Public Backlash

lead_paragraph: Federal Communications Commission Chairman Tom Wheeler is broadening the scope of his proposed open Internet rules and suggesting tougher standards for Internet providers who wish to create paid priority fast lanes on their networks.
